room_title: Escape room "Crusader's Alley" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: The Crusaders Alley was clever but it felt like there was a lack of clues to guide you through. We just ended up banging on and moving things while taking wild guesses. In the end, we didn't finish, but it wasn't a particularly well-planned room.

room_title: Escape room "Crusader's Alley" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: We have been to many escape rooms around the area, and Amazing Escape is one of our favorites! We loved Crusader's Alley, and have now sadly completed every room at the Montclair location.The staff was super friendly, and pointed us in the right direction during our experiences which made it fun and allowed us to continue thinking critically and imaginatively. Can't wait for them to change up the rooms in Montclair so we can return!

room_title: Escape room "Crusader's Alley" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Amazing Escape room is just awesome. If you go you must check out Crusader's Alley. It's good for the family, friends or well anyone but be sure to bring a group of at least 4 for maximum room exploration. My 9-year-old son loved it and we're already making plans to come back!

room_title: Escape room "Crusader's Alley" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Great Experience! We escaped from "Crusaders Alley!" 10 family members did this together - kids, parents, and grandparents - and everyone had so much fun!I highly recommend this to any family who is looking for a fun, memorable activity to do together!
